system_overview: Training Grounds / 6-axis spatial reasoning substrate operationalizing Jordan Caldwell's Black Metal philosophy for self-alignment work through sonic explorations and SHED-INTEGRATE-GROUND operators.

mindsets_paradigms.current: Clarity through simplification; reduce to essentials
mindsets_paradigms.target: Clarity through noise; catharsis as insight (Black Metal principle)

organizing_principles.target: 6-axis system preserves complexity while enabling navigation
organizing_principles.intervention: Axes + operators as spatial reasoning substrate

information_flows.current: No visibility into which axes get engaged
information_flows.target: Trail tracks axis movement; suggests underexplored dimensions
information_flows.intervention: Alignment journey visualized as path through 6D space

system_infrastructure.current: Physical book format (Jordan's project) doesn't translate easily
system_infrastructure.target: Digital interface that captures some richness
system_infrastructure.intervention: Accept friction rather than force fit

dynamic_processes.embedded_values: Self-help industry values simplification and actionability
dynamic_processes.process_redesign_opportunity: Complexity as feature, not bug; density as clarification

social_positionalities.power_dynamics: Jordan's world is source; Watson operationalizes
social_positionalities.safety_concerns: Operationalization might flatten what makes it valuable
social_positionalities.legitimized_expertise: Black Metal philosophy is niche; may alienate mainstream

invisible_work.articulation_labor: Translating Jordan's physical book into digital form
invisible_work.emotional_labor: Holding tension between fidelity and usability

collaboration_friction.friction_source: Jordan's book is designed for print; physical object; rich texture
collaboration_friction.system_response: Could not absorb her variety quickly
collaboration_friction.lesson_learned: Document friction rather than force fit; friction is the information
collaboration_friction.resolution: Produced prompt guides and hands-on exposure rather than feature-complete tool

integrated_intervention_strategies.infrastructure_work: Preserve complexity without reducing; axes + operators as navigation tools
Sound as cathartic medium; density-as-clarification experience
Trail of axis positions over time; pattern recognition

key_commits: README: Black Metal as method, self-alignment framework

invisible_trail: Jordan Caldwell's Black Metal philosophy book (entire source)
Friction of system not absorbing her variety
Decision to accept friction rather than force fit

meta_rule: Analyze self-alignment systems by asking: What axes of experience does this framework allow navigation of, AND what infrastructural conditions (collaboration dynamics, medium translation, fidelity vs. usability) shape what can be operationalized without flattening?
